text.page:
373
102-187a @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/ gdong khru ba'i tshe chu khyor

374
102-187b gang la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs s+ho// //
